explains: n. 双方得分相等时的最后决赛；复赛；季后赛

sentences.en: Nick Faldo was beaten by Peter Baker in a playoff.
sentences.cn: 尼克·福尔多在加时赛中被彼得·贝克击败。

sentences.en: But it was a playoff game against the Lakers.
sentences.cn: 但那场比赛是对阵湖人的季后赛。

sentences.en: That also marked their last playoff series defeat.
sentences.cn: 这也是球队的最差季后赛之旅。
